movies.title: Avatar
movies.actors: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang
movies.plot: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.title: I Am Legend
movies.writer: Mark Protosevich (screenplay), Akiva Goldsman (screenplay), Richard Matheson (novel), John William Corrington, Joyce Hooper Corrington
movies.actors: Will Smith, Alice Braga, Charlie Tahan, Salli Richardson-Whitfield
movies.plot: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

movies.writer: Zack Snyder (screenplay), Kurt Johnstad (screenplay), Michael Gordon (screenplay), Frank Miller (graphic novel), Lynn Varley (graphic novel)
movies.actors: Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham
movies.plot: King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.writer: Joss Whedon (screenplay), Zak Penn (story), Joss Whedon (story)
movies.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
movies.plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 34 wins & 75 nominations.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie, Matthew McConaughey
movies.plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.
movies.awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 35 wins & 154 nominations.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.actors: Ellen Burstyn, Matthew McConaughey, Mackenzie Foy, John Lithgow
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Game of Thrones
movies.actors: Peter Dinklage, Lena Headey, Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington
movies.plot: While a civil war brews between several noble families in Westeros, the children of the former rulers of the land attempt to rise up to power. Meanwhile a forgotten race, bent on destruction, plans to return after thousands of years in the North.
movies.awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 185 wins & 334 nominations.

movies.title: Vikings
movies.actors: Travis Fimmel, Clive Standen, Gustaf Skarsgård, Katheryn Winnick
movies.plot: The world of the Vikings is brought to life through the journey of Ragnar Lothbrok, the first Viking to emerge from Norse legend and onto the pages of history - a man on the edge of myth.
movies.language: English, Old English, Norse, Old, Latin
movies.awards: Nominated for 7 Primetime Emmys. Another 17 wins & 49 nominations.

movies.title: Gotham
movies.actors: Ben McKenzie, Donal Logue, David Mazouz, Sean Pertwee
movies.plot: The story behind Detective James Gordon's rise to prominence in Gotham City in the years before Batman's arrival.
movies.awards: Nominated for 4 Primetime Emmys. Another 3 wins & 22 nominations.

movies.title: Power
movies.actors: Omari Hardwick, Joseph Sikora, Andy Bean, Lela Loren
movies.plot: James "Ghost" St. Patrick, a wealthy New York night club owner who has it all, catering for the city's elite and dreaming big, lives a double life as a drug kingpin.

movies.title: Narcos
movies.writer: Carlo Bernard, Chris Brancato, Doug Miro, Paul Eckstein
movies.actors: Wagner Moura, Boyd Holbrook, Pedro Pascal, Joanna Christie
movies.plot: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 4 nominations.

movies.title: Breaking Bad
movies.actors: Bryan Cranston, Anna Gunn, Aaron Paul, Dean Norris
movies.plot: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's financial future.
movies.awards: Won 2 Golden Globes. Another 132 wins & 218 nominations.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.writer: Scott Derrickson (screenplay), C. Robert Cargill (screenplay), Jon Spaihts (story by), Scott Derrickson (story by), C. Robert Cargill (story by), Steve Ditko (comic book)
movies.actors: Rachel McAdams, Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen, Tilda Swinton
movies.plot: After his career is destroyed, a brilliant but arrogant and conceited surgeon gets a new lease on life when a sorcerer takes him under her wing and trains him to defend the world against evil.

movies.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
movies.writer: Chris Weitz (screenplay), Tony Gilroy (screenplay), John Knoll (story), Gary Whitta (story), George Lucas (characters)
movies.actors: Felicity Jones, Riz Ahmed, Mads Mikkelsen, Ben Mendelsohn
movies.plot: The Rebellion makes a risky move to steal the plans to the Death Star, setting up the epic saga to follow.

movies.title: Assassin's Creed
movies.writer: Bill Collage (screenplay), Adam Cooper (screenplay), Michael Lesslie (screenplay)
movies.actors: Michael Fassbender, Michael Kenneth Williams, Marion Cotillard, Jeremy Irons
movies.plot: When Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, he discovers he is a descendant of the secret Assassins society.

movies.title: Luke Cage
movies.actors: Mahershala Ali, Mike Colter, Frankie Faison, Erik LaRay Harvey
movies.plot: Given superstrength and durability by a sabotaged experiment, a wrongly accused man escapes prison to become a superhero for hire.
